original_text: Boaz felt very happy when he had finished his food and drink. He lay down next to the heap of barley seeds. Ruth went to him very quietly. She lifted the cloth that covered his feet. Then she lay down there.
korean_text: 보아스가 먹고 마시고 마음이 즐거워 가서 곡식 단 더미의 끝에 눕는지라 룻이 가만히 가서 그의 발치 이불을 들고 거기 누웠더라

sentences.original_text: when he had finished his food and drink
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 음식과 마실 것을 마쳤을 때

sentences.original_text: He lay down next to the heap of barley seeds
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 보리 곡식 더미 옆에 누웠습니다

sentences.original_text: Ruth went to him very quietly
She lifted the cloth that covered his feet
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그의 발을 덮은 천을 들어 올렸습니다
